mapper.insert: insert into goods (goodsName, goodsPrice, goodsPoint, goodsType, goodsImg) values(#{goods.goodsName}, #{goods.goodsPrice}, #{goods.goodsPoint}, #{goods.goodsType}, #{goods.goodsImg});

insert into post (post_userId, post_goodsNum, postDiscount, postImg) values(#{post.post_userId}, (select goodsNum from goods where goodsName=#{goods.goodsName}), #{post.postDiscount}, #{post.postImg});
insert into portfolio.option (option_goodsNum, optionColor, optionStock) values((select goodsNum from goods where goodsName=#{goods.goodsName}), #{color}, #{stock});
mapper.select: select * from portfolio.option where option_goodsNum = #{goodsNum} and optionIsDel = 'N'
mapper.update: update portfolio.option set optionIsDel = 'Y' where option_goodsNum = #{goods.goodsNum}
mapper.select: select * from portfolio.option where option_goodsNum = #{goods.goodsNum} and optionColor = #{color}
mapper.update: update portfolio.option set optionStock = #{stock}, optionIsDel = 'N' where option_goodsNum = #{goods.goodsNum} and optionColor = #{color}
update post set postIsDel = 'Y', postDelDate = now() where postNum = #{postNum}
mapper.select: select count(*) from portfolio.order where orderState = 0
